definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be attached to, love (NH press together, desire (rare); Aram. [[חֲשַׁק]] bind, saddle (an ass))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[ח]] De 7:7 + 4 t.; [[חָֽשְׁקָה]] Ge 34:8; [[חָשַׁקְתָּ]] Is 38:17 (but v. infr.); [[וְחָֽשַׁקְתָּ֫]] De 21:11; —be attached to, only fig. = love, a woman sq. [[בְּ]] Ge 34:8 (P) De 21:11; elsewh. of ´[[י]]'s; love for Israel De 7:7, De 10:15, and of love to ´[[י]] Ps 91:14; sq. acc. cogn.+ [[לְ]] and inf. ´[[כל־חֵשֶׁק שְׁלֽמה אשׁר ח]] [[לִבְנוֹת]] 1Ki 9:19 = 2Ch 8:6; [[חָשַׁקְתָּ נַפְשִׁי מִשַּׁחַת]] Is 38:17 lit. thou hast loved my soul out of the pit, i.e. lovingly delivered it; but rd. [[חָשַׂכְתָּ]] thou hast held back, kept, from LXX Vulgate Lo Ew Che Di, or [[חֲשׂח]] hold back (Imv.), so Du.
